title: The Scruffs
description:
The Scruffs have enlisted your help to save their beloved family home from being sold. Granpa Scruff has come up with a solution - an elaborate scavenger hunt to recover valuable artifacts, he&#039;s hidden around the house. But in a surprising twist, Granpa Scruff also reveals that he&#039;s been hiding something else - a shocking family secret. Help the Scruffs stave off this looming family crisis and uncover the secret that will change their lives forever. 

1000&#039;s of items to find. 20 locations to explore. 

Already cracked.
